item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 24 Oct 2023
item.description:
1. Using Reason and React meta-frameworks. Also some Melange 2
  2. Ppxlib dev meetings
  3. A hack to implement efficient TLS (thread-local-storage)
  4. New Get Started Documentation on OCaml.org
  5. Web Analytics on OCaml.org
  6. OCaml.org Newsletter: August and September 2023
  7. Release of odoc 2.3.0
  8. Announce Seppo.Social v0.3 and invite thoughts
  9. bwd 2.3.0 for backward lists
  10. Storing credentials to a private OPAM repository
  11. OCaml on Windows: the long paths issue
  12. A Roadmap for the OCaml Platform - Seeking Your Feedback
  13. Adding Dynamic Arrays / Vectors to StdLib
  14. vdom 0.3: functional UI applications now with custom event handlers
